story:
Once upon a time, in a peaceful village in Sudan, there was a kind-hearted little girl named Nawal. Nawal was known for her love of animals and her gentle spirit. She would often wander around the village, making friends with every creature she met.

One day, Nawal discovered a baby giraffe who had become separated from its family. The poor little giraffe was all alone and frightened. Nawal knew she had to help, so she took the giraffe in and cared for it as if it were her own baby.

She named the giraffe Gari and made sure it had plenty of food and water. She even built a special enclosure for Gari using branches and leaves from the trees. Nawal and Gari quickly became inseparable, and they spent their days exploring the village together.

As Gari grew stronger and bigger, Nawal knew it was time for him to return to the wild. She was sad to see him go but knew it was the best thing for him. So, she took Gari to a nearby nature reserve, where she knew he would be safe and happy.

But as they approached the reserve, they noticed that the other giraffes were in danger. A group of poachers had infiltrated the reserve and were trying to capture the magnificent creatures. Nawal knew she had to do something to help.

With all her courage, Nawal stepped forward and confronted the poachers. She told them to leave the giraffes alone and to never come back. The poachers were surprised by Nawal's bravery and decided to listen to her. They packed up their things and left the reserve, leaving the giraffes in peace.

Nawal and Gari returned to the village, where they were hailed as heroes. From that day forward, Nawal became known as the "Giraffe Whisperer," and she continued to protect and care for the animals in her village.

And so, every night, Nawal would tuck Gari in and tell him stories of their adventures. They would fall asleep, dreaming of the beautiful world they had created together.

And they all lived happily ever after.

The end.

Now it's time for you to close your eyes, little one, and dream of your own adventures. Goodnight.
